values.value: Substance-specific documentation that communicates physical, health and environmental hazards, safe handling, protection and first aid/medical treatment measures, is required hazardous chemicals or materials used for work activities. This requirement can include "household" chemicals if workplace exposure exceeds duration and frequency greater than normal consumer use. Digital access of SDS's is acceptable if every affected employee has access to the data without having to leave their work station. CFR 1910.1200 (g)
Are SDS's (Safety Data Sheets) available on site for required hazardous substances?
